plot: Despite their fighting on opposite sides during the Civil War, brothers Vance and Jeb Britton have to set their differences aside in order to survive an Indian attack.

title: The Secret of Convict Lake
plot: In 1871 a convict escapes, with other prisoners, to kill the man that framed him, but has second thoughts after meeting the man's beautiful future wife.

title: Tension at Table Rock
plot: A reluctant gunslinger tires of having to defend himself at every cow town he visits, so he adopts an alias and continues his wandering...

title: Sitting Bull
plot: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Sioux's patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks.

title: Great Day in the Morning
plot: After a card game Southerner Owen Pentecost finds himself the owner of a Denver hotel. Involved with two women - one who came with the hotel...

title: Una nuvola di polvere... un grido di morte... arriva Sartana
plot: Wily roving gunslinger Sartana arrives in a small town and tries to find a hidden fortune of half a...

title: Das finstere Tal
plot: Through a hidden path a lone rider reaches a little town high up in the Alps. Nobody knows where the stranger comes from, nor what he wants there. But everyone knows that they don't want him to stay.

title: The Walking Hills
plot: A group of treasure hunters search for a wagon load of gold, buried years before in Death Valley.
